TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi WebBrowserArray extends Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray implements class System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider
Public Class WebBrowserArray Inherits BaseControlArray Implements IExtenderProvider

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 提供 控件的控件数组

span.span: Provides a control array of controls

remarks.format: ## Remarks `WebBrowserArray`类提供了等效的运行时功能的 Visual Basic 6.0`WebBrowser`数组。The `WebBrowserArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebBrowser` array. 它不提供的 Visual Basic 6.0 控件数组的设计时功能。It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array. > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CanExtend`方法可以用于确定是否可以使用特定控件是控件数组从其克隆其他元素的基本元素。The `CanExtend` method can be used to determine whether a specific control is the base element of the control array from which the other elements were cloned. > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将引发此事件通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改属性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 在 控件完成加载文档时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control finishes loading a document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件导航到新文档时的以下属性之一设置或调用的方法：The control navigates to a new document whenever one of the following properties is set or methods is called: - - - - - - - - 处理`DocumentCompleted`新文档完成加载时接收通知的事件。Handle the `DocumentCompleted` event to receive notification when the new document finishes loading. 当`DocumentCompleted`事件发生时，完全加载新文档，这意味着你可以访问通过其内容， ，或属性。When the `DocumentCompleted` event occurs, the new document is fully loaded, which means you can access its contents through the , , or property. 若要接收通知，在导航开始前，处理事件。To receive notification before navigation starts, handle the event. 处理此事件，可以取消导航，如果某些条件未满足，例如，当用户未填写完表单。Handling this event lets you cancel navigation if certain conditions have not been met, for example, when the user has not completely filled out a form. 处理可以接收通知的事件时控件完成导航并开始加载新的位置上的文档。Handle the event to receive notification when the control finishes navigation and has begun loading the document at the new location. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法从你的应用程序代码调用此方法。This method cannot be called from your application's code. 使用`AddHandler`挂接事件通过使用添加任何控件方法。Use `AddHandler` to hook up events for any controls that are added by using the method. > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Item`属性是控件数组的默认属性。The `Item` property is the default property for a control array. 因此，以下代码行是等效的。Therefore, the following lines of code are equivalent. ```vb MsgBox(CStr(WebBrowserArray.Item(1).Text)) MsgBox(CStr(WebBrowserArray(1).Text)) ``` > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 当 属性的值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将引发此事件通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改属性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 当 属性的值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将引发此事件通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改属性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 在移动控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is moved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 在 控件导航到新文档并开始加载该文档时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control has navigated to a new document and has begun loading it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件导航到新文档时的以下属性之一设置或调用的方法：The control navigates to a new document whenever one of the following properties is set or methods is called: - - - - - - - - 处理`Navigated`可以接收通知的事件时控件导航到新文档。Handle the `Navigated` event to receive notification when the control has navigated to a new document. 当`Navigated`事件发生时，新的文档已开始加载，这意味着你可以访问通过加载的内容， ，和属性。When the `Navigated` event occurs, the new document has begun loading, which means you can access the loaded content through the , , and properties. 处理可以接收通知的事件时控件完成加载新文档。Handle the event to receive notification when the control finishes loading the new document. 你也可以接收通知，在导航开始通过处理前事件。You can also receive notification before navigation starts by handling the event. 处理此事件可取消导航，如果未满足某些条件，例如，用户未填写窗体。Handling this event lets you cancel navigation if certain conditions have not been met, for example, the user has not filled out a form. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 在 控件导航到新文档之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the control navigates to a new document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件导航到新文档时的以下属性之一设置或调用的方法：The control navigates to a new document whenever one of the following properties is set or methods is called: - - - - - - - - - 你可以处理`Navigating`事件取消导航，如果某些条件未满足，例如，当用户未填写完表单。You can handle the `Navigating` event to cancel navigation if certain conditions have not been met, for example, when the user has not completely filled out a form. 若要取消导航，`Cancel`属性对象传递给事件处理程序`true`。To cancel navigation, set the `Cancel` property of the object passed to the event handler to `true`. 你还可以使用此对象检索通过新的文档的 URL属性。You can also use this object to retrieve the URL of the new document through the property. 如果网页框架中，将显示新文档，则可以检索通过框架的名称属性。If the new document will be displayed in a Web page frame, you can retrieve the name of the frame through the property. 处理可以接收通知的事件时控件完成导航并开始加载新的位置上的文档。Handle the event to receive notification when the control finishes navigation and has begun loading the document at the new location. 处理可以接收通知的事件时控件完成加载新文档。Handle the event to receive notification when the control finishes loading the new document. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 在浏览器新窗口打开之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before a new browser window is opened.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将打开一个单独的浏览器窗口时的相应重载调用方法，或当用户单击**在新窗口中打开**在鼠标指针悬停于时在浏览器快捷方式菜单超链接。The control opens a separate browser window when the appropriate overload of the method is called or when the user clicks **Open in New Window** on the browser shortcut menu when the mouse pointer hovers over a hyperlink. 你可以通过设置禁用的快捷菜单属性`false`。You can disable the shortcut menu by setting the property to `false`. `NewWindow`新的浏览器窗口打开之前发生的事件。The `NewWindow` event occurs before the new browser window is opened. 你可以处理此事件，例如，若要防止窗口打开时不满足某些条件。You can handle this event, for example, to prevent the window from opening when certain conditions have not been met. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 当控件的 属性更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control's property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将引发此事件通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改属性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 在 控件已更新有关要导航到的文档的下载进度的信息时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control has updated information about the download progress of a document that it is navigating to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件的处理程序可用于实现类似于在 Internet Explorer 中导航进度栏。You can use a handler for this event to implement a navigation progress bar similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 使用属性以确定已成功下载的字节数。Use the property to determine the number of bytes that have been downloaded successfully. 使用属性来确定总可供下载的字节数。Use the property to determine the total number of bytes available for downloading. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不支持此方法，并调用它不会引发异常。This method is not supported, and calling it does not raise an exception. > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 在调整控件大小时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is resized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定的调整大小的控件，可以强制转换`sender`参数数据到并获取其属性 (或和属性单独)。To determine the of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the data to a and get its property (or and properties individually). 若要处理自定义布局，使用事件而不是`Resize`事件。To handle custom layouts, use the event instead of the `Resize` event. 在响应中引发事件`Resize`事件，但还会在响应其他影响控件的布局更改。The event is raised in response to a `Resize` event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `SetIndex`控件数组中创建的初始元素时，仅应调用方法。The `SetIndex` method should only be called when you are creating the initial element in the control array. 若要添加后续元素，调用方法并指定`Index`。To add subsequent elements, call the method and specify the `Index`. > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 在 属性值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property value changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将引发此事件通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改属性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 系统颜色更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the system colors change.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将引发此事件更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。This event is raised if the is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 在控件完成验证时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is finished validating.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你通过使用键盘 （选项卡上，按 SHIFT + TAB 等），通过调用更改焦点或方法，或通过设置到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: `Validated` 当你通过使用鼠标或通过调用更改焦点方法，焦点事件按下列顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: `Validated` 如果属性设置为`false`、和`Validated`事件将被抑制。If the property is set to `false`, the and `Validated` events are suppressed. 如果属性设置为`true`中事件委托中，通常会发生后的所有事件事件将被抑制。If the property of the is set to `true` in the event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the event are suppressed. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 在控件验证时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is validating.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你通过使用键盘 （选项卡上，按 SHIFT + TAB 等），通过调用更改焦点或方法，或通过设置到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: `Validating` 当你通过使用鼠标或通过调用更改焦点方法，焦点事件按下列顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: `Validating` 如果属性设置为`false`、和事件将被抑制。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. 如果属性设置为`true`中事件委托中，通常会发生后的所有事件事件将被抑制。If the property of the is set to `true` in the event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the event are suppressed. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
